title: Chocolate coffee kisses
ingredients: ['For the meringues', '2 medium egg whites', '115g caster sugar', '75g dark chocolate, finely grated or chopped', 'cocoa powder for dusting', 'For the filling', '250ml double cream', '1 teaspoon instant coffee, mixed with a little water to form a paste', '1 tablespoon icing sugar, sifted']
